Reviews.Title: fuji rules again
Reviews.Author: Richard P. Thorne "Ric T"
Reviews.Content: I just got this 2 days ago, but I already love the quality and the beautiful simplicity to the settings...as some digitals are very overly-complicated .This basic digital camera does the job, was fairly priced and this camera puts back in the fun of taking photos...Got in the habit of only doing video for a couple of years ..This takes GREAT quality photos ine SRAUTO mode...great results...Love it and thanks to Amazon...Regard, Ric Thorne

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for price
Reviews.Author: Ellis WC
Reviews.Content: I am a new photographer and I am just getting in to photography and this camera is ver very old quality for the price.Here are some things you should note:1) the body of the camera is completely plastic, which I found to be a bt disappointing. But still good so far.2) there is no viewfinder3) the battery takes 6 hours to charge,which I find a bit long. But it may be sort to others.That's pretty much all the thins that I think are important.I was quite amazed at the quality of the pictures.The flash is very bright, which should be good upto about 10 or 12 feet away.It is very small and compact which is very good.If you are looking for accessories to go with this camera, I would recommend:1) RooCase nylon hard shell case ( about $10 )2) Transcend 8 or 16 GB memory cards ( $6 for 8GB )3) VidPro gripster mini tripod ( $3 )All of these accessories together will cost about $115Not too bad for all that.Overall, a very good camera for how much it costs.Five stars for sure

Reviews.Title: Great camera with only a couple weak spots
Reviews.Author: Caleb
Reviews.Content: This camera really surprized me. The angle of the lens is really amazing, it says it is 26mm. The zoom is ok, but my old Sony Mavica has better zoom. The videos are okay outside, but inside get a bit grainy. You can choose wether you want digital or optical zoom during videos, I guess the optical uses more battery power. Speaking of battery power, did I mention that I haven't had to charge it for days? And no, I haven't taken two pictures with it, i've taken several videos, and a bunch of pictures with it. Other random stuff: the videos are very un- compressed, and there are no compression modes to set. My 1080p camcorder video files are smaller in size. A one minute video is like 200 MB, and that will add up! The 14 MP photos are around three and a half MB. It takes SDXC cards, although I only use an 8 GB SDHC card (that will store around 2,000 photos at default resolution). Like others have said, indoor pictures are poor with no flash, but it handles the flash very well, and photos never come out over- exposed. Also, this camera powers up REALLY fast. Litterally under a second. It acctually comes one faster than it goes off! All in all, this is a great camera for general purposes.

Reviews.Title: Good Still Photos; Terrible Video!
Reviews.Author: P. Wee "esotericon"
Reviews.Content: Although I have several cameras, including a high-end Canon DSLR, I couldn't resist this one because of the low price I paid.  It's really, really small, and my other cameras are large enough that they're a nuisance to take along.  This one, however, fits easily in a shirt pocket and weighs only several ounces.  Considering the low price, the still photos are remarkably good! The camera is well-designed.  Since I've only owned it for a week, I can't determine yet how long this camera will endure.  But for general snapshots, many people will find this an ideal product.  Compared to the 12x, 18x, telephoto zooms on many digital cameras now, 5x isn't much.  Still, there have to be trade-offs where light weight and small size (and low cost) are concerned.  It's also a great second, third or fourth camera.  The video it delivers, however, is terrible quality, grainy and unpleasant, and you wouldn't really want to archive them. Best to just forget it has video capability and be happy with the still photos.

Reviews.Title: Fuji camera
Reviews.Author: Abbers
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my 12 year old daughter as a replacement (cameras don't need to be washed in the washing machine). She loves it and it takes really good pictures. I didn't have my camera around on Christmas morning so we used this one, and I'm very pleased with the product. The only reason for the four is it feels a little flimsy and it was hard to get the battery in the first time.  Still worth buying, though!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard K. Rohrer Sr.
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace another deg. Camera, the Fuji is a far better camera.i am very pleased with Fuji  & the service I received from AmazonThanks

Reviews.Title: Great camera for kids and adults
Reviews.Author: Cathoilicmom
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera for my two girls ages 9 and 11.  They go to camp in the summer and wanted one to take along to record memories.  I thought about getting them a cheap $30 digital that took AA batteries but I knew I would go broke on batteries.  I wanted a cheap easy to use one and saw this and read the reviews.  I can't be happier!  The camera takes nice clear photos and is so easy to use.  They figured it out without any problem.  The screen is large on the back and the photos are crisp and clear.  For the price this Camera is great for adults who just want a simple camera that takes good photos or as a first camera for a kid.  I want one myself.  Or better yet I will retire as the family photographer!  The only downside thus far is the battery life.  But this may be due to their over usage of a new toy.  It also takes great movies.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Jon Scott Binkley
Reviews.Content: I had another Fuji camera that I had bought a few years ago and I really liked it a lot. In the middle of taking pics it just quit working one day so I started looking for a new one right away. I found this one and was surprised at how small it is. It's not much bigger than my cel phone which is really nice. I work in the auto racing industry so I take a lot of pics of cars and such. I was even able to get some great shots (after several not so great) of cars in motion, which was all but impossible with my other camera. The only thing I don't like about it is that, in low light situations, it picks up dust in the air and magnifies it. But, considering that the old one could not take pics in these conditions, I'll work around it somehow. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: A. Hall
Reviews.Content: Things I love about this camera. 1) it charges similar to a cell phone (no need to remove the battery to charge) 2) Once you set force flash or no flash and you turn on and off the camera the setting stays until you decide to change it 3) Same as two when you set a shooting mode i.e. portrait/scenic etc. it stays even if you turn the camera on and off repeatedly 4) Very easy for my 7 year old to operate 5) this blue color makes it easy to spot 6) easy to start video once camera is turned on... red button! 6) extremely lightweightThings I don't love 1) It only has 5x zoom which isn't really doesn't make too much of a difference 2) When zoomed it's easy to get a blurry shot... better to take the picture full frame and crop 3) Have to set forced flash to take good indoor pictures otherwise the subject turns out grey colored

Reviews.Title: Non working battery
Reviews.Author: Aileen F Miller
Reviews.Content: Battery would not work, had to return the camera.  I will have to see if the new camera work better.

Reviews.Title: Great, lower priced camera
Reviews.Author: maggerz
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these in blue and another in pink (from another store) and they both work great.  My sisters had a blast shooting photos at our wedding and the pictures came out just as well as the professional's.  We did not experiment with outdoor shooting at night but outdoor during the day, indoor during the day (with many windows), and indoor at night all worked excellent.The girls will have many more opportunities to take pictures and make memories.  I'm glad we chose this product.

Reviews.Title: okay camera
Reviews.Author: geoff
Reviews.Content: camera has a lag on it. when you turn it on, it takes about 5 seconds before you can take a picture. my canon camera can take pictures as soon as it is on. camera is cheap so i cant't complain

Reviews.Title: Good for the "camera impaired"
Reviews.Author: AvidReader
Reviews.Content: Does this take the greatest pictures ever?  No.  But, if you are not the most electronically able person or as I call myself "camera impaired", it works great.  I was able to take decent pictures without trying to figure out any settings.  It is also easy to charge and to upload pictures to your computer.  All in all, this was a good purchase for me.

Reviews.Title: Broken Upon Arrival
Reviews.Author: Emily Grau "emilygrau"
Reviews.Content: We ordered two of these cameras.  When the red one arrived we were able to set up the basic information, but when we went to take a picture we received an error message saying "Please turn off the camera and then turn it back on." The lens is stuck out and won't retract back into the camera. The black camera let us take one picture before giving us the same error message. After searching the Internet I found that many people have these same problems with the lens. Apparently, the gears are plastic and break very easily. In our case, they arrived broken.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the prices
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Roach
Reviews.Content: Pretty inexpensive camera but it's very's easy to use and it takes good photos for the price.  Love the red color.

Reviews.Title: 10 year old son loves it
Reviews.Author: msysum
Reviews.Content: Santa brought this for my 10 year old son and it is perfect for him.  He probably took 200 pictures on Christmas Day.  It is very easy for him to use and download and the battery life is great.

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: Altan
Reviews.Content: The price of the camera was amazing. But the quality was not as expected. The video quality is bad and the photo quality at night is not the best.

Reviews.Title: It's fine for the price
Reviews.Author: O. B. Juan Kenobski "Joe Blastoff"
Reviews.Content: I just spent $80 and it does a fine job for snap shots.  Have had it for several month with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Birthday to me present
Reviews.Author: Jim Lawson "JRLMJH"
Reviews.Content: My older Fujifilm Finepix camera finely gave up the ghost. I hated to get rid of it but it could not be repaired. So I bought this one and have been happy with this purchase for my occasional use.

Reviews.Title: Great budget camera with quality photography
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Ball
Reviews.Content: This is a great small inexpensive camera.  It has a very quick response and focus time where I can take pictures quickly at odd angles that are still in focus.  The slim profile makes it a very convenient pocket camera.  The dust cover helps keep the worries away.  The battery life is adequate for any trip I have ever taken it.  The picture quality and colors are higher than I expected for the price of the camera.  Great deal!

Reviews.Title: so happy
Reviews.Author: C. Crowson "cjcrowson"
Reviews.Content: I am so glad we got this camera. We took a chance on a warehouse deal and got a great deal. We saved $30 and the camera came with everything in its original packaging. There was no description of what was included and that was a little worrisome but you do have a 30 day return. There was no memory card but we had one from our other camera. The camera has a rechargeable battery and the chord is adaptable to be used for charging and for downloading to your computer. The screen is a nice size and the camera is compact but very nice. Comes with a manual and a DVD which I have not watched yet. I should recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: D. Diaz
Reviews.Content: I've been using this great little camera for a couple weeks now for work. It takes great pictures, if you need a camera I'd buy this one!

Reviews.Title: Lasted less than a year
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Driscoll
Reviews.Content: I owned the Finepix for approximately 9 months. I used it 5 or 6 times before it stopped working. The camera was taken care of, stored in a case and was not dropped or banged.  The shutter would error, go in and out and eventually just stay closed with an error message.  The camera took nice pictures, was user friendly and the interface with the computer for picture upload worked quickly. Unfortunately this camera has made it to the trash after less than 1 year of light use.

Reviews.Title: Budget camera works just as high price ones
Reviews.Author: Hanjad
Reviews.Content: This product was chosen because of its competitive price. Although it is 14 mp and newer models are 16 mp it works well for the average user who wants a point and shoot camera for occasional use. A professional photographer would use a SLR with telephoto lens. This comes with its own battery, this reduces the cost of buying rechargeable penlights as with other brands. If you want a camera to take photos on occasions buy this.

Reviews.Title: Kids Camera
Reviews.Author: T. Miller
Reviews.Content: Im not impressed with this camera.Like:- The neat "modes" which you would not find on a wireless phone camera.- AffordableProblems:- The HD video recording is a joke compared to my Motorola wireless phone. My phone provides incredible HD recording compared to this "dedicated" camera.- The video record only has GO and STOP. No pause. It will record about 10min in HD before it stops and makes you start a new file.- The picture quality is no better than my wireless phone. Even at 14M and my phone is 3M.- The battery was showing almost dead after about 27min of straight video recording.Overall, I think it's a cheap camera that's good for kids.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP CCD
High Quality Fujinon 5x Optical Zoom Lens
2.7 inches LCD
HD Movies (720p)
Li-Ion Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix JX500 Digital Camera (Black)
